name: jsonhint-ts
description: Extension to display resolved token values from JSON with full resolution chain, compatible with Tokens Studio logic.

jsonTokensHint.showIcons.description: Show icons for token types in hover.

jsonTokensHint.showArrows.description: Show arrows between tokens in inheritance chain.

jsonTokensHint.complexTypes.description: List of token types treated as complex (rendered as tables).

jsonTokensHint.noisyTokens.description: List of tokens to exclude from the inheritance chain (noisy tokens).

jsonTokensHint.maxChainLength.description: Maximum chain depth displayed in hover tooltips.

jsonTokensHint.maxSuggestions.description: Limit number of completion suggestions to avoid UI lag.

jsonTokensHint.allowNoDollar.description: If true, the extension will recognize tokens defined without a leading '$'.
